description: In a classroom setting with a teacher at her desk and students at their desks, one student stands before the class holding a glass jar containing a grotesque, disembodied face. The teacher is announcing that this student will be presenting something he found on the beach for show-and-tell. The humor lies in the surreal and horrifying nature of the 'found object' being presented in a mundane school activity, contrasting the expected seashells or rocks with a preserved head.
caption: "And next, for show-and-tell, Bobby Henderson says he has something he found on the beach last summer. ..."
